incident_updates.body: All services have fully recovered. Users should no longer experience any errors when accessing the dashboard or collectors.
In addition to the dashboard page, users may experience errors when creating collectors for their surveys.
Our team is aware of an issue that is causing users to see an error on the Dashboard page. Our team is investigating and has identified the cause.

incidents.name: New surveys being created with incorrect theme. Customers on Basic plan incorrectly seeing error that survey has paid features

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are aware of an issue where new surveys are being created with an incorrect theme. Also customers on Basic plans are incorrectly seeing an error that paid features have been added to new surveys. Our team is hard at work on getting everything back up to speed, and things should be back to normal soon.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

incidents.name: Salesforce Integration Lightning Component "Send Survey" feature currently unavailable

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
Our engineers are actively investigating why the 'Send Survey' feature is currently not working for our Salesforce integration (Lightning Component)

incidents.name: SurveyMonkey is experiencing slowness or is unavailable.

incident_updates.body: Issues have been resolved

Multiple parts of SurveyMonkey are experiencing slowness or are unavailable, including Design and Analyze.

Our engineers are actively investigating.
This issue has been resolved.
We are aware of an issue where API calls may be rejected. The cause of this issue has been identified, and we are working to get everything up and running again.

incidents.name: Error showing when trying to access surveys

incident_updates.body: This issue is now resolved.
We are aware of an issue where an error is showing when accessing some surveys. The cause if this issue has been identified and we are working to get everything up and running again.
We've discovered an issue with payments. Users may have trouble checking out or upgrading their paid plans.

incidents.name: Incident impacting analyze and survey pages

incidents.name: SurveyMonkey app crashing for some iOS users

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved. The full fix was implemented days ago and we monitored for a few days to ensure that there aren't any remaining issues that would resurface.
A full fix for the issue has been released. We are currently monitoring before calling the issue as fully resolved.

A partial fix was released, which should resolve most of the crash issue. There still may be some residual issues with our SurveyMonkey iOS app. Our team is still working on a full fix so any remaining issues should get resolved with the full fix.
The issue has been identified. The issue affects the SurveyMonkey iOS app (not the SurveyMonkey Anywhere iOS app) for some iOS users. We are working on a fix.
